programme.title: Agatha Christie's Criminal Games
programme.desc: Laurence and Avril investigate a wealthy spa owner after a man drowns in her establishment. Based on the Hercule Poirot novel.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Criminal Games
programme.desc: Avril investigates a murder in a hospital while she's admitted for her own injuries. Based on the Miss Marple novel "A Caribbean Mystery."

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Criminal Games
programme.sub-title: The Man in the Brown Suit
programme.desc: Inspector Laurence goes undercover as a female secretary for the French Secret Service. Based on the novel by Agatha Christie.

programme.title: The Little Murders of Agatha Christie: The House of Peril
programme.desc: A young fashion designer, the target of several murder attempts, calls Inspector Larosiere to protect her. Adapted from Peril at End House by Agatha Christie.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Into The Wild Frontier - Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wild West Chronicles - Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman: Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wild West Chronicles - Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout: Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Happy Trails: Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger's prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - Lines in the Sand: The thirteen remaining cowboys face their first immunity challenge that tests their individual skills. The contestants race to score the fastest time in barrel racing and calf roping. While most cowboys impress Trace and the judges, only one will be safe from the next elimination. For the team challenge, the cowboys take on a group of untrained horses that they have to break, saddle, and ride. In the end, it all comes down to strategy, and the team that thinks ahead takes the win. After a few choice words, teammates lock horns, determined to out-cowboy the other. When an unexpected cowboy heads home, the rest of the contestants realize every move they make counts in this competition.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: The Old West Trading Post - Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt: In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

But her recovery takes an unexpected turn when she starts experiencing eerie visions: One day, she sees a vision of a child living in the same building being hit by a car. Shortly after almost risking her life to save the child, she has yet another chilling vision about a girl living on the 7th floor being harassed by a man, and does what she can to help the girl. She runs into her former boss at an art school, and learns that her husband may not be telling the truth about everything.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia shares her technique for making a basic marinara,enthusiastically immersing herself in sauce making Lidia's way. Shethen prepares twofaoritepasta dishes: a seafood vermicelli with fresh clams and scallops and a parchment wrapped, baked ziti with mozzarella, marinara and fresh basil.Tutti a tavola!She commands, and we follow joyfully.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia grew up playing hide-and-seek in the corn fieldssurroundingher home in Pula, Istria. Making polenta at her mother's knee was almost a daily activity. Lidia teaches how to make the best basic polenta,country style. Shethendemonstratesafamily favorite: sauted polenta with field mushroomsandfollows it withthe perfectdessert: polenta with honey and fresh strawberries.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Watching Lidia prepare her special dish of chicken with sausage, turning golden brown as the bite size pieces caramelize and nestle together in a hot skillet is a sensual experience. You can smell the aroma of garlic, olive oil, vinegar, and honey wafting through her kitchen.Lidia's second dish, country-style spring chicken with olives and potatoes, is perfect as a follow-up.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: Gnocchi is a Lidia favorite. As a child, it was a Sunday dinner staple on the Matticchio table, which Lidia helped her mother cook. The secret to great gnocchi is making it light and fluffy, then shaping it. Lidia makes two gnocchi dishes: gnocchi in Lidia's plain tomato sauce and gnocchi rolled and filled with ricotta/spinach/leek stuffing, dressed with a savory sage butter sauce.

programme.title: Lidias Italian Table
programme.desc: In Italy, a great risotto always brings a smile. Here, we all smile as Lidia prepares Risotto Milanese, a simple risotto with saffron broth, finished with butter and Parmigiano Reggiano, and Suppli di Telefono, risotto rolled into balls filled with prosciutto and mozzarella, then crisply fried. When split, the mozzarella pulls apart like telephone wires, thus the name.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia prepares Frico, a specialty of her native Friuli. Frico is a pancake made by sauteing Montasio cheese in a skillet until golden brown. Lidia shows us the basic dish, and then a creative surprise. Next, it's Chicken under brick: a split chicken seared (under the weight of a brick, or heavy skillet) on the stove top until crisp-skinned, golden brown, and served immediately.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table
programme.desc: Lidia Matticchio Bastianich cooks a universal favorite, marinated lamb chops, served with a memorable sauce, prepared with fresh mint leaves, wine, stock, citrus juices and herbs. The lamb is served with scaffata -- spring legumes simmered slowly along with crispy, golden roasted potato wedges.

programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the Knight-a-Kon in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever infiltration mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the Minitrex a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for Best Costume. The prize: Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1. The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's justaboutto get the book whenthe impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1 is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macyshe deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights the Tighty Knighties are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero. But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament she's agreed to be in princess mode for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef clair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. Hot chili makes hot monsters! Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands meaning Jestro's could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef clair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef clair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of clair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and clair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and clair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. Nope, not hot enoughwaaaay too much garlic.you call that hot?! (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests thenmore training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort Exalted Towers renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the high class resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are off at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to seeJestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of snotty monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a snotheiser ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bathhe'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or twoit's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power Glorious Griffon but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hearlaughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, my monster is so fat jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as bouncers to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. AndJestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be badhe is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages himgo on stage alone, be funnyhe can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a joke book that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: Where's my Jestro?! Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest withthe Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: S01 E12
programme.desc: Can you make your food streeeetch? When Matt and Lily make pizza dough that breaks instead of stretches over the pizza pan, Science Whiz shows them how kneading the dough is the key to the science of stretch. At an authentic noodle restaurant, Avery watches a professional noodle puller hand-stretch 1000 strands of noodles. Back at home base, Avery and Lily stretch out the noodle dough for their own take on Italian ravioli!

programme.title: S01 E011
programme.sub-title: Anoki's Igloo, Fish, Lemons and Gherkins, An Exciting Fishing Trip - Guess What
programme.desc: EP31: Tijinou and Tijibelle catch up with Anoki. His igloo is almost ready, it's just missing the roof. His friends want to help him lay down the roof but it's so heavy that only Super Hero is strong enough to carry it! EP32: Tijinou and Tijibelle are greeted by Anoki and Super Hero. Our friends have brought a basket full of food: honey for Bianca the little Bear, yellow for Anoki, and chicory and pickles for Dylan l'lan, who just loves that! Mmm EP33: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on the ice, they hear laughter and joyous yelping! It's Hot Dog the puppy playing with Bianca the little Bear around a picnic basket. But Anoki asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to deal with it because he promised Thunder Fairy to teach him to fish on the ice.

programme.title: Band Together
programme.desc: Jewel learns that Keys Sharps 'N' Flats wants to become a pop star, and helps her create a new band.

programme.title: S03 E06
programme.sub-title: The Littlest Berrykin - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, The Littlest Berrykin, into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. But before leaving, they must choose which of their three princesses (played by Lemon, Raspberry and Strawberry in royal gowns) will rule the kingdom.

programme.title: S03 E07
programme.sub-title: The Berry Big Relay Race - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the retrieve part of the activityas soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search. Orange finds Strawberry, Plum and Raspberry in Lemon's salon, getting their hair and nails done, but something starts going terribly wrong with the appliances.

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.desc: When her store-bought taco shells crack into a gazillion pieces, Lily cooks up a batch of home made taco shells that crunch without cracking. Meanwhile, Avery investigates how chickens lay eggs without cracking them, and makes a trip to see some of the biggest eggs of all at an ostrich farm! Then our hosts take a crack at cooking each other's favourite omelet, and the results have Matt cracking up!

programme.title: S02 E01
programme.desc: Looking for ways to have a meal in a cup, Avery visits the Gimme A Squeeze Juice Bar to make fruit smoothies. Lily tries her hand at goat milking at a goat dairy farm. Back in the kitchen, Matt demonstrates how to taste two delicious soups in the same bowl.

programme.title: S01 E013
programme.sub-title: Thunder Girl's Basket, The Frozen Trunk, The Invitation - Guess What
programme.desc: EP37: While Thunder Fairy is sliding down the toboggan with Anoki, the puppy Hot Dog steals from him the basket of food. EP38: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on a magic train on the edge of the ice. Crack, crack they're walking on peanut shells, you'd almost think it were a dump site!EP39: Tijibelle and Tijinou catch up with Rigolini, Super Hero and Thunder Fairy headed to Anoki's new igloo, because he's waiting for them to celebrate his new move!

programme.title: S01 E01
programme.sub-title: Sausage Wants To Play, Hilda Wants To Fly, A Snack For Hilda - Guess What
programme.desc: EP01: Violette prepares a surprise and asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to go get some milk. But Hot Dog, the practical joker, takes the milk can and escapes. Tijinou and Tijibelle set out looking for him.EP02: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive, Violette's farm is in turmoil. In fact, Hilda the hen decided it was time to fly.EP03: Just as Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at the Farm, Violette entrusts them with a little bag. It's Odile the hen's party. But which way should they go to find Odile ?

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.sub-title: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C! Pac and Friends remain loyal to the elderly inventor and, together they uncover a plot by Betrayus to terra-form PacWorld into a world just like the Netherworld prior to invasion and conquest.

programme.title: S01 E14
programme.sub-title: Pac-Pong Fever - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: The annual Pacolympics approach and allow for Aunt Spheria to reignite a Pac-Pong rivalry with her former Pac-Pong rival and wanna-be suitor - Lord Betrayus. Let the games begin!

programme.title: Festival Of Sugary Sweets
programme.desc: When a sugar shortage threatens the annual Festival of Sugary Sweets, the Lalaloopsy friends devise a delicious way to save the day and discover that when you work together as a team, you can make something really special.

programme.title: S03 E08
programme.sub-title: The Berry Best Treasure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the caf, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of controllife in Berry Bitty City is impossible! Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! She describes a game where the girls divide into two teams, and each team creates fun written clues for the other that lead to funny objects the girls must collect.

programme.title: S03 E09
programme.sub-title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest! Rallied by a sense of competition and adventure, the girls divide into three groups and set up tentseach convinced they will be the bravest group. They each come up with diverting activities to distract themselves.

programme.title: Ryan's World Specials | Toontastic!
programme.desc: Discover how fun learning can be with YouTube superstar, Ryan, and all of his Ryan's World friends!

programme.title: Ryan's World Specials | Titan Tales
programme.desc: Discover how fun learning can be with YouTube superstar, Ryan, and all of his Ryan's World friends!

programme.title: LankyBox | Roblox Challenges!
programme.desc: LankyBox is Roblox superstars Justin and Adam, two best friends who love playing popular video games!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Super-Duper Surprise!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Art of the Challenge!
